comment.author: 34803119@N00
comment._content: Moro County is a transcription error... it should be Mora County. Just east of Santa Fe County.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: gnarlodious: Thanks for the correct info. We’ll need to change the source data so that we can keep the information we show here in Flickr and in our own catalog ( http://www.loc.gov/rr/print/catalog.html) in sync.
